title: Custom RAG Evaluation, Traditonal Metrics + score, category and LLM Based remarks
author: Aditya Mahakali
description:
Custom RAG Evaluation, Traditonal Metrics + score, category and LLM Based remarks

Calculation of following metrics:
 "remark", "category", "score","jaccard_similarity","cosine_similarity","levenshtein_distance","url_availabilty","url_MRR_rank"
